This movie tells the story of the real-life event that took place during World War II, and it features an talented cast, including Ryan Phillippe, Neal McDonough, and Jamie Bell. Alternatively, you might enjoy "Bobby." This movie tells the story of Bobby Moore, a footballing icon who faced many battles beyond those witnessed on the football field.
